participant_1.name: Emma Carter
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, with a love for literature and crafting.
participant_1.background: I like going barefoot. My favorite book is Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice. I work as a tutor for English literature. I can knit.

participant_2.name: Liam Johnson
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and playful, with a passion for storytelling and sports.
participant_2.background: I am a Georgia resident. I love to read fiction books. My favorite fiction genres are sci-fi and horror. I play in an NFL fantasy football league.
